snippet: In her latest work, Ms. Patek, who often takes on disturbing subjects, mixes her family history with material from the famous murder trial.
lead_paragraph: In her latest work, Ms. Patek, who often takes on disturbing subjects, mixes her family history with material from the famous murder trial.

headline.main: A New Dance by Rebecca Patek at Chocolate Factory
headline.print_headline: Dance; Leopold and Loeb, Beyond Pas de Deux
